reviewText: This Dvd is excellent.  You will watch it over and over again.  Anthony Burger can play like no one else can.  You will be so touched by this beautiful music.  He is very missed but I am sure he playing joyfully in Heaven for everyone.  His personal story is so touching, and you know he was chosen by God for playing his wonderful music.
summary: Chosen by God to play beautiful music.
Title: N/A

reviewText: God took a wonderful and talented pianist far too soon. Every time I listen to his music, it is almost like hearing it for the first time. The man was amazing and to die so early in life  proves the rule that  "only the good die young." His claim that he had the fastest right hand in the world goes undisputed by me. His music was fantastic and I enjoy his recordings almost every day.

reviewText: This is a fun CD for all fans of Anthony Burger AND Bill and Gloria Gaither's wonderful "Homecoming" musical series.
Title: N/A

reviewText: If you like the Gaither's, then you will enjoy this pianist.  So sad when I heard he passed away.He was a great pianist and accompanist to all the singers on their shows.  I really enjoyedthis dvd and will enjoy it for many years.  I am glad that I purchased this.

reviewText: Beautiful selection of songs from a master of Christian Gospel piano music who was snatched from this world much too young when he was raptured off his keyboard in the middle of a concert!
Title: N/A

reviewText: Wow. I am just so glad I purchased this DVD. I had hesitated, because I have Anthony Burger playing the piano on several of my DVDs, but this is just really different. The interview with Bill Gaither and the clips from different concerts are all put together beautifully. In addition, there is a precious moment when Mr. Burger is relaying an incident about his little son, that would touch anyone's heart.It could have nothing less than five stars. What a pianist he was, and such a dear person!Mickey
Title: N/A

reviewText: Wow! What a GREAT DVD!  It shows Anthony playing like no one else I've ever seen.  He does a fantastic job, and it is so enjoyable to watch him tear up the piano!It is so sad that he has passed away.  He will be greatly missed!!OSSlady
Title: N/A

reviewText: Gaither Concert Series features the piano Artistry of Anthony Burger on the video "The Best of Anthony Burger from the Homecoming Series."These performances include:* Goodbye, World, Goodbye from Back Home in Indiana* Great is They Faithfulness/How Big is God/How Great Thou Art Medley from London Homecoming* Exodus from the I Do Believe concert* Holy, Holy, Holy from Irish Homecoming* The Hallelujah Chorus from Australian HomecomingOne of my favorites from the video is:  We Shall Behold Him from the Atlanta Homecoming.I also enjoyed the numbers included featured in the Mark Lowry On Broadway concert.  Bill Gaither's interview with Anthony revealed insights into his humility, his personal faith, and his desire to serve God.A treasured addition to my DVD library.  A wonderful tribute and memorial to the gifted piano artistry of Anthony Burger.
summary: The Piano Artistry of Anthony Burger
Title: N/A
